summary: FAQ feature testing complete. Backend API (7/7 tests passed) returns FAQ items with coin policy disclaimer. Frontend FAQ page renders correctly with disclaimer banner, accordion items, and proper navigation from Landing page.

integration_issues.flow: Profile page View FAQ button navigation
integration_issues.issue: Playwright testing environment has auth state persistence issues between navigations - this is a testing limitation, not app bug. Code review confirms button is correctly implemented with data-testid='profile-faq-link' and onClick navigates to /faq

success_rate.frontend: 100% (FAQ page, disclaimer banner, accordion, landing footer link all work correctly)

seed_data_creation: FAQ data is hardcoded in backend - no seed needed
context_for_next_testing_agent: FAQ feature complete. Backend endpoint /api/faq returns 8 FAQ items with coin policy disclaimer. FAQ page accessible at /faq (public route). Landing page footer has 'FAQ & Help' link (data-testid='footer-faq-link'). Profile page has 'View FAQ' button in wallet section (data-testid='profile-faq-link'). Accordion uses shadcn Accordion component with data-testid='faq-accordion'. Disclaimer banner has data-testid='faq-disclaimer-banner' with coin policy text.

features_tested.backend_faq_endpoint: PASS - GET /api/faq returns 8 FAQ items with correct structure
features_tested.backend_disclaimer: PASS - Response includes disclaimer: 'FREE11 Coins are non-withdrawable reward tokens...'
features_tested.backend_coin_policy_item: PASS - First FAQ item (priority 1) is coin-policy with correct answer
features_tested.frontend_faq_page: PASS - /faq page renders with FAQ accordion and disclaimer banner
features_tested.frontend_disclaimer_banner: PASS - Shows 'Important: About FREE11 Coins' with full disclaimer text
features_tested.frontend_accordion: PASS - Accordion expands/collapses correctly (8 FAQ items)
features_tested.frontend_landing_faq_link: PASS - Footer 'FAQ & Help' link navigates to /faq
features_tested.frontend_profile_faq_button: CODE VERIFIED - 'View FAQ' button implemented with navigate('/faq')
features_tested.frontend_back_button: PASS - Shows 'Back to Home' for public users

mocked_apis_verified.faq_data: FAQ items are hardcoded in backend server.py (lines 851-908) - no external API
